# Need for historic mitigation or site preservation  

## Data requirements/sources
Can be inferred from proximity to National Register of Historical Places and/or townships. 
Dam age and size may be found in the [National Inventory of Dams](https://nid.sec.usace.army.mil/#/){target="_blank"}. 
In case mitigation is required, associated costs can be estimated based on mitigation action.  
  
## Citations
([Foley et al. 2017](https://www.fs.usda.gov/research/treesearch/55282){target="_blank"})
